name: Multris (RustyMonster)
description:
A modified version of Tetris with randomly generated "Multrominoes" of varying sizes, rather than just the the classic Tetrominoes made of only four blocks.

More Possibilities! Hundreds of different pieces! Play how YOU want to!

GitHub (Source): https://github.com/RustyReich/Multris

VirusTotal: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/e2ffbcccc7d579f2b121f795b76523d6b32947302fe58...
